metadata.title: CVE-2024-0565 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds memory read flaw was found in receive_encrypted_standardin fs/smb/client/smb2ops.c in the SMB Client sub-component in the LinuxKernel. This issue occurs due to integer underflow on the memcpy length,leading to a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0565` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
